statements.select: SELECT * FROM PCEarProtectCheck WHERE CheckDate BETWEEN #StartDate# AND #EndDate# and IsReport=#IsReport#
select case when exists( SELECT * FROM [dbo].[PCEarProtectCheck] WHERE ISReport= #value# ) then 1 else 0 end
select top 1 * from dbo.PCEarProtectCheck WHERE ISReport= #value# order by InsertTime
select top 1 * from dbo.PCEarProtectCheck WHERE ISReport= #value# order by InsertTime desc
select top 1 * from dbo.PCEarProtectCheck where InsertTime < #InsertTime# and ISReport= #ISReport# order by InsertTime desc
select top 1 * from dbo.PCEarProtectCheck where InsertTime > #InsertTime# and ISReport= #ISReport# order by InsertTime
select case when exists( select * from dbo.PCEarProtectCheck where InsertTime < #InsertTime# and ISReport= #ISReport# ) then 1 else 0 end
select case when exists( select * from dbo.PCEarProtectCheck where InsertTime > #InsertTime# and ISReport= #ISReport# ) then 1 else 0 end
